title: New ultimate skin?
body:
i just wanna know what champion do you think should get the next ultimate skin?? 
personally i think {{champion:74}} should get it

replies.body:
I personally believe it'll be syndra. 

Process of elimination:

- ADC/Sup/JG have already had ultimates. 

Therefore it should be mid/top. An ultimate skin is meant to display the real heart and soul of a character. 

Syndra has natural parts in the game she gains power (read transforms), and i think it'd be a super cool concept. She's also seen play this year.

Nah it won't go to Heimer cause he already has a legendary. I hope its a Vayne skin, Soulstealer Vayne was extremely disappointing for the Vayne mains who aren't willing to spend 300 plus dollars for a skin when there are much better and cheaper options. 

Realistically its probably some boring champ that no one plays like Lord Sesshomaru said.

Evelynn.

The ultimate skins have so far gone to champs that have uninteresting kits_ (and the point of an ultimate skin to to make a champ interesting)_, and eve just runs in spamming Q, so not overly interesting.
Her model and effects are outdated.
She has almost no skins, and the ones she does have are legacy, and all look the same anyway.

She's the perfect candidate.
